mapper.insert: insert into(question_id,question_name, question_score, question_creator_id, question_level_id, question_type_id, question_category_id, question_description, question_option_ids, question_answer_option_ids, create_time ) values(#{question_score}, #{question_creator_id}, #{question_level_id}, #{question_type_id}, #{question_category_id}, #{question_description}, #{question_option_ids}, #{question_answer_option_ids}, #{create_time} )
